page.title: 19Education - local play group
page.content: A thriving, well run play-group is open on two mornings a week in the Milton Village Hall. Children from nearby communities and from Brampton attend. It caters for about 20 children whose ages range from about 2 and a half to five years old. There is one paid person in charge and one paid helper, with one mother also helping at each session on a rota basis. The children choose from a large range of activities, painting, doing puzzles, modelling, playing with sand, water and toys, or in the play house. There is no formal education, though children are encouraged to listen to stories, look at picture books and join in singing and games activities. Parents pay for each session the child attends and some financial help is organised through the Play Group Association.
